dmca.title: Salomon requests video links removed
dmca.body:
Re: Salomon v. Net Management Services et al./Copyright Violations United States District Court, Central District of California Case No. CV 04-I553

Salomon v. LFP Broadcasting, et al./Copyright Violations United States District Court, Central District of California Case No. CV 05-8603


Dear [private]:

I guess by now you probably remember me. My name is Jim Salomon, and I own substantial rights in the Salomon/Hilton Video. This is a follow up to: the [private] Esq. of Lavely & Singer letter to you of March 16, 2004 (in numerous prior emails to you, I've already attached copies) as a result of which Google reportedly removed something like 23 UR1
